FLAME 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Modeling Synthetic Data

Generate Data

Data_Generation.Rd

Generate Data

Data_Generation(num_control, num_treated, num_cov_dense, num_covs_unimportant)

Arguments

num_control

Number of controlled samples
num_treated

Number of treated samples
num_cov_dense

Number of covariates
num_covs_unimportant

Number of unimportant covariates

Value

Data Frame

Examples

Data_Generation(10,10,10,0)
#>    x0 x1 x2 x3 x4 x5 x6 x7 x8 x9     outcome treated
